comments.creator: spacer@au.ru
comments.text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0 1. i select checkboxes "Load images" and "for the originated web sites only" in Option menu 2. select XColibur scheme in LiveJournal 3. goto site which contains images from another site (for example: http://www.livejournal.com/community/ru_foto/4003049.html site containe images from http://img.photobucket.com) 4. images not displayed and there is no places where images must be (i think small icons on this places, like IE shows, is good idea), so i can't right click on image and select "View image" command in the context menu. 5. with IE6.0 it's all right 6. with Dystopia scheme in LiveJournal it's all right Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1. select checkboxes "Load images" and "for the originated web sites only" in Option menu 2. goto http://www.livejournal.com/manage/siteopts.bml 3. select "XColibur" scheme and english language 4. goto http://www.livejournal.com/community/ru_foto/4003049.html 5. select "Select All" in context menu Actual Results: there is no square places for images from non-originated site in livejournal entry. must be 5. for example for "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v405/osipova/3acab870.jpg" image. Expected Results: must be 5 square places for images from non-originated site. default theme. WinXP SP2 eng. source code in both schemes for part of the page (which contains images) is same:
красный день календаря.







надо выбрать одну..
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.7.5) Gecko/20041107 Firefox/1.0 1. i select checkboxes "Load images" and "for the originated web sites only" in Option menu 2. select XColibur scheme in LiveJournal 3. goto site which contains images from another site (for example: http://www.livejournal.com/community/ru_foto/4003049.html site containe images from http://img.photobucket.com) 4. images not displayed and there is no places where images must be (i think small icons on this places, like IE shows, is good idea), so i can't right click on image and select "View image" command in the context menu. 5. with IE6.0 it's all right 6. with Dystopia scheme in LiveJournal it's all right Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1. select checkboxes "Load images" and "for the originated web sites only" in Option menu 2. goto http://www.livejournal.com/manage/siteopts.bml 3. select "XColibur" scheme and english language 4. goto http://www.livejournal.com/community/ru_foto/4003049.html 5. select "Select All" in context menu Actual Results: there is no square places for images from non-originated site in livejournal entry. must be 5. for example for "http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v405/osipova/3acab870.jpg" image. Expected Results: must be 5 square places for images from non-originated site. default theme. WinXP SP2 eng. source code in both schemes for part of the page (which contains images) is same:
красный день календаря.







надо выбрать одну..
comments.author: spacer@au.ru

comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.text:
"there is no square places for images from non-originated site in livejournal
entry."

This is by design. Blocked images should not show a placeholder.


-> invalid
